title: Executive Order 5853-Waiver of Maximum Age Limit, George H. Rolfe
content: The maximum age limit is hereby waived to permit George H. Rolfe to enter the open competitive examination for the position of postmaster at Concord, N.H.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5853-Waiver of Maximum Age Limit, George H. Rolfe Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361450
